p: A low number of Ae. albopictus mosquitoes were collected in this study and were only from the municipalities of Caxias and Codó, showing that this species still has a wild behavior, preferring areas with forests and vegetation. As this study was carried out in residences located in urban neighborhoods, few specimens were collected. However, it is necessary to monitor their density, as this species have been showing changes in behavior and were reported close to urban areas [ 64, 65], including studies conducted in the municipality of Caxias, Maranhão [ 35, 36].
